inn1.comm: 137kph, a little nibble away after he targets the ball full on middle. Gets a thick edge that dribbles away to third man.
142 kph, teases him outside off and Dilshan is lured into a lash. Tried to check his shot and in the end it was quite a tame open face that the fuller ball skirted past to the keeper

on the pads and he's whipped it smartly to the boundary, off the mark in style. Sticks to a fuller length but his adjustment of the line was a little too much and Dilshan and his wrists take advantage
peach! This time he found the perfect length to dart the ball back in. Brings the batsman forward and Dilshan is cut in half as he drives away from the body
the yorker ends up a low full toss on off stump, Dilshan taps it towards the covers
gets forward and presets a solid dead bat to a good length ball on middle and off
shortish and on the hips, Tharanga flicks it around the corner and pitches camp at the non-strikers'. Didn't really bring his two slips into play there
good probing angle around the off stump and Dilshan offers it free passage to the keeper
lovely delivery, gets lift and seam away from the right hander./ Pinned him to the crease and makes him waft away from the body. Soundly beaten
that's on a length and with a little room, Dilshan realises it can be put away and tries it hammer it away over cow corner. Gets it off the bottom of the bat and over midwicket and mid-on
fuller and pushed away from Dilshan, this time he's wary and lets it go
keeps to a shortish length on the stumps, Dilshan tucks it to midwicket
back of a length, with a little nip in. Hit on the pads, but high enough to entertain no appeal
outside edge, but doesn't carry! This was a fuller delivery on and around off stump, Tharanga is brought forward and his defensive push is foiled by a little seam away
pushed in on the body and Tharanga turns the ball away off his hips to long leg
too straight again and Tharanga whips it around the corner. Effortless use of the wrists to keep the ball down and it flew away until the fielder behind square on the boundary intervened

how did the miss off stump?! Perhaps the juice on the pitch and his height, but this was way too close for comfort. Hammered in on a decent length and darts the ball away, Dilshan lifts his bat and hands up into the sky
good length ball on and around off stump, defended solidly
beautifully bowled. He's been a little iffy around his off stump this morning. His footwork is minimal and the hands push at the good length ball that nips away from the outside edge
jags a shortish ball back in at him and Tharanga was quite uncomfortable. He took too much time to get into a flick and gets an inside edge onto the body. That awayswinger is worrying him
switches back to the one that goes away but started it too far outside off
an encore, this time down the pads. Tharanga wants to help it along to the long leg boundary but his timing is off
fuller and a touch outside off, Tharanga is forward and blocks with a closed face. Still a little jittery out there
has to bowl that again. He's striving for a little too much pace perhaps? This fuller ball veers way past the batsman's reach outside the off stump. Not that he didn't try
full and homing in on off stump, Tharanga leans forward for a flick and gets an inside edge onto pad. Muted appeal
that's a rock solid defensive, right down the pitch. He'd be pleased with that, negotiated the shortish delivery quite well
stuck in the crease again as he throws his bat outside off. Might even have jumped outside leg while facing a good length ball with a little nibble away

this was quick, straight and Dilshan plays around it! The ump says that's good enough for me, but Sri Lanka go for a review. He's been bowling fuller this innings and the extra pace does the batsman in. Pitching just about in line, hitting just about in line again and the shot was just awful from the opener. Touch too full for that whip and he pays for it
fullish on middle, Sanga gets in line and keeps it out.

indecision again! The line is excellent from Irfan again, just around the off stump and he was looking to leave it, which would have been good, but then pushes and gets a little bottom edge behind him
taps it into the covers, nice soft hands enables him to nick a single
his lift off this deck is quite difficult to control, but Tharanga isn't fazed by it. Gets back in line and loosens the grip on his bat to blunt a shortish ball on midlde
fuller and outside off, not bothered with
pushes him back in the crease and the fuller length makes Sanga bring down a defensive bat
turns a good length ball into the leg side
fullish and just outside off, Sanga is forward with a solid defensive push
gets a little inside edge onto pad, Sanga tries to sneak another quick single but Junaid is too quick for him on the followthrough
keeps the ball fuller on off stump, Sanga taps it down the pitch with considerable authority
fuller ball inviting the drive and Tharanga isn't one to say no. Pushed on the up through the covers
forces him deep in his crease with a shortish ball around the off stump, Sanga gets up on his toes to keep it down
just back of a good length but Sanga won't waft outside off
pins him to his crease on off stump, Sanga isn't too flustered as he closes the bat face on impact and tucks the shortish ball to midwicket
a little more bounce, which is par for the course for a seven-foot quick. Sanga loosens his grip and controls it well
banged in short and rose a little too high for Akmal behind the stumps. Sanga ducked under it quite quickly and enjoys one wide
full and angled in on leg stump, Tharanga was looking to whip it away before restraining the impulse and keeping a straight bat face. Sort of shovels it down to mid-on

it would have been a booming drive through the covers, the Sanga trademark, however he got into the shot a little too early and gets an inside edge. Little anxious to get going, perhaps. And Pakistan pile on the pressure again

that would have been a stunner! Sanga had nailed the cover drive, and didn't really need to keep it down. But Fawad makes his heart leap into his mouth as he dives full length, stretches out a right hand and holds it. But as he fell back, his elbow hits the turf and the ball pops out. Terribly unfortunate
nips down the track and pushes outside off as he sees the ball nipping away. Gets a thick outside edge that sails past the reach of second slip
full and wide, too far outside off as Sanga leaves
pitched just back of a length and this veers back in quite alarmingly! Sanga lifts his bat out of the way after covering the off stump. Tight leave
this is in the air again, but there is no one in the leg gully region. Seems to be going at the fuller balls with hard hands.
lifts off a decent length as Tharanga is caught in the crease as he throws his hands at the ball. Beaten
leans into the drive and this time he pierces the gap after keeping the ball down and sticking to that amazing timing he has. Not as much swing for Irfan now
that's excellently played again, Irfan digs it in short and makes Sanga use all his height to negotiate it with soft hands and the ball drops at his feet
fullish on and around the stumps, Sanga works the angle towards midwicket
slapped through the covers. He saw the ball full, saw width on it and unleashed a cracker of a drive through the covers. No one moved
he's spotted the short ball early, leaps up off the ground and bunts it at his feet again. Soft hands are back
opens the face and chops a shortish ball, but it finds point
hangs back and taps the short ball past the slips to the third man. Lovely control
short and wide, Sanga didn't move across enough to get in position for the cut and he misses. That was quite wide too, lucky escape for Junaid
whacked in front of midwicket! He's getting his eye in and that is not good news for Pakistan. Too short  from the bowler and it sat up for Sanga to belt to the boundary
shortish around the off stump, Sanga blocks it under his eyes

edged but it flies over the cordon again! Another fortunate boundary for Sanga as Junaid has his hands on his head. Perhaps a little too much width on offer again and the flash was hard enough to go the batsman's way
switches to a fuller ball on middle, jags it back in late too. Defended stoutly
gets the ball to grip into the deck a little and fools Tharanga who was setting up for an on-the-up slap through the covers. Rises up to hit his splice as the bottom hand flies off the bat
finds a good length just outside off and Sanga blocks
gets a little seam away but it was short enough for Sanga to spot and get himself behind it
sets up for the cut, but the shortish ball was not as wide as he originally thought
just back of a length and outside off, Tharanga is lured into playing away from the body
again a little too close to cut and he meets it with a bit of a closed face so the timing is awry. The off side field square hustles to get behind it
flighted just outside off, pushed down the ground to long-off
pushed through and it goes on with the arm. Sanga waits, reads it off teh pitch and blocks
brings the batsman forward with a flatter ball on off stump
nips down the track and pushes it back to the bowler Sanga has to hurry back as Hafeez feigns a throw
gets back in his crease to tap the flatter ball to short cover
a little shorter again and Sanga goes back to tap it to the sweeper
shortish on the body, he shuffles across and tucks into the midwicket region
smoked through the covers! That's when Tharanga looks imperious. Ventures forward and drums the fuller ball, a shade outside off, all along the turf

nicks off! Pakistan have their first second and Tharanga's strength ends up a weakness again. He was completely squared up by a shade of movement to a back of a length delivery. His legs were splayed down the leg side and his hands offered a loose poke outside off. Akmal behind the stumps takes a neat catch
just back of a length on off stump, Mahela's defensive bat is strong though

not quite as certain there, as Sanga was before him. This was probing the angle across the right hander and Mahela, who was shaping to leave, decides to push his bat at it at the last minute. Gets a bottom edge towards point

extra bounce! But Mahela's soft hands are more than a match. Not that he wasn't in discomfort though as the short ball reared up around chest high. Terrific bowling from Wahab as the pressure mounts on Sri Lanka again
flighted on off stump, Sanga is forward to push down the tpich

strikes, and it's another left-hander that bites the dust, a big one too! Perhaps a touch more bounce than Sanga thought and the chop through point ends up a lob straight to the man. Pakistan well and truly on top now
flighted on middle and leg, Chandimal tickles it around the corner to get off the mark
looped up on middle, flicked to short midwicket
brings Mahela forward again but he plays with the turn to midwicket
tucked away to midwicket again as the last three balls pitched in almost exactly the same spot
shortish and a shade outside off, Chandimal taps it down on the off side
shortish on middle and leg, Chandimal was a little too early on his defensive push and has to adjust
good length with a little nip away on off stump, Chandimal is behind it though. Tipping towards the 140ks

tapped down the ground and Hambantota roars and the horns become deafening. Brings down a straight face on a good length ball and Mahela does the splits to let the ball skim down to the long-off boundary
shortish on off stump, Chandimal is back in his crease to block
shuffles across and whips a shortish ball from off stump to the fielder at long leg. Seems to be as urgent as he normally is at the start of his innings

shortish on off stump, reasonably slowish at 127 kph, Chandimal shuffles across in line with the ball and wears it on his chest. This one nipped back instead of going on with the angle as the batsman thought
strays on the pads and Chandimal glances it off his hips to long leg
rises up with the shorter ball angled across him, Mahela uses soft hands to dab it towards point
fires in a fuller delivery on middle, Mahela waits on it and whips it through midwicket. Races away to the boundary to take him off the mark. Overpitched and gracefully punished
banged in short and Mahela was put in some discomfort. It had lifted from back of a length, but it was leg sidish enough for the batman to escape safely enough
more bounce for Irfan and this was angled right at the body. Chandimal wants to fend it off but is hurried by the extra pace
full and wide, Mahela looked to flay it through the covers. Not much footwork there as Mahela flashes and misses. Huge appeal from the keeper, but to no avail. No edge
good length ball on off stump, defended solidly
a little too short and Mahela has hammered it to the right of fine leg. Poor ball and dealt with as he pulls, keeps it down and doesn't sacrifice on his timing either
went for the flowing cover drive again, but this was a touch too wide for him to really want to be playing
this time he finds a fuller ball to his liking outside off and creams it through extra cover. Magnificently played, such a straight bat-face too and a long lunge forward
shortish on off stump, predictably, and Mahela is behind it
his bounce is quite alarming. Chandimal has no answer to one that rears up off back of a length and skids onto his body
this whistles off the deck, rises up towards Chandimal's elbows as he tries to fend then decides to leave. Akmal goes up in appeal as the bouncer nearly brushed his armpit
back of a length on the stumps, Chandimal jumps but stays in line to defend

he's holed out on the hook! Irfan's bounce was always formidable and Chandimal took it on and gets a top edge that sinks into the hands of the fielder. How many times has he done that in the last few months?
shortish, but a little too straight and Mathews flicks his wrists and earns a couple through midwicket
there was a short leg in place, but Mathews has managed to exert just enough control to beat him on his left. Had him hopping, but Sri Lanka can heave a sigh
picked away through square leg, but there is protection in the deep
gets outside the line of off stump and whips a shortish ball through midwicket. Bowler could have adjusted his line a little better there
fuller on off stump, Mahela steps forward to punch the ball back to the bowler
whipped off middle and leg and he played it late enough to turn the ball behind him to square leg. Wahab bowling 140+ ks
shortish and a shade outside off, Mathews shuffles and uses his wrists to dab the ball through midwicket again
back of a length on off stump, Mahela taps it into the off side
backs away to the leg side now and slaps a shortish ball to point. Good work there from Shehzad who dives to his left
slips this length ball down the leg side with Mathews shuffling to the off side

banged in short and at the body, Mathews shuffles and tries to fend it away. Too much bounce for his liking as he pulls the bottom hand off the bat. The ball dies on its way to the right of leg slip. Irfan's got everyone hipping
banged in short and down leg, looking to bring that leg slip in play again but the umpire doens't like it
just back of a good length on off stump, Mathews blocks
good length ball on off stump, tapped into the covers and nick a single. Well done
pushes him back and gets him up on his toes, Mahela does well though as he blunts it down at his feet
just back of a good length, Mahela is wise to it as he opens himself up and uses an angled face to ride the pace down to third man
flighted just outside off, Mahela pushes it back down the pitch
flatter but on a good length, defended
flighted with a little drift in on middle. Reaches forward to defend
leans into a drive this time as he opens the face on a wide, fuller delivery through point
gets back on middle and flicks a flatter ball off his ankles. They wanted two, but decided on safety first
flighted on middle and off, defended
flighted on middle, Mathews lunges forward and taps it down the ground to long-on
good lenght ball, but it was shaping down leg so Mahela tucks it away behind square leg
goes back and whips a length ball through midwicket
gets down the track, but Hafeez had spotted him and shortened his length. Mahela has to adjust and flick to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, pushed down the ground to long-on
shortish on middle, tapped down to long-on and drinks wander out to the field
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
loopy delivery on middle, Mahela whips it off his toes to square leg
shorter against Mathews, who stays back and punches it down to long-off
turned away behind square leg as he comes forward to a fuller ball on middle and off
brings down the straight face on a flighted ball on middle and off, easy single to long-on
little turn outside off and Mahela works with it as he leans forward to defend
flighted on middle and leg, Mathews pushes to mid-on
pushed back as this is flatter and quicker, Mathews taps it down the ground again
has a little more time with this ball slower and he flicks to midwicket
pushed down the ground as this is flat and full on off stump
turned away to deep square leg as it is full and angled in on leg stump to keep him quiet
a little more flight there and Mathews gets a bit of an inside edge to the man at deep square leg again
nicely flighted on off stump, Mathews leans forward and almost yorks himself. Gets a single as midwicket misfields
eased down the ground as he comes forward to the flighted ball on middle and off
driven strongly to long-off as Afridi offers a touch more room
looks for the drive again but is wary of the dip and pulls in his shot. Defended
shorter and sliding down leg, Mahela swivels around and pulls to short fine leg who misfields as well. Hafeez was the culprit this time, Younis was the one before
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed back at the bowler
tossed up on off stump, Mahela is happy to tap it down the ground to long-on
closes the bat face a little too soon against a straighter delivery and presents a leading edge. Goes to ground though
good length ball just outside off, Mathews defends with an open face for a single through point
gets in line with a flighted ball on middle and turns it to midwicket
turned away behind square leg as Hafeez tosses it up
pushed down the ground for another easy single
nicely tossd up on middle and off, eased down the ground again
nicely flighted on middle and leg, Mahela shuffles and turns it to the left of midwicket. Younis is a little late to getting to the ball and his throw is a little feeble
opens the face and secures a quick single behind point
shortish and wide outside off, carved away to deep point
swept away and he has beaten short fine on his right. Good shot as he read the line and used Afridi's extra pace nicely
chips down the track but restrains himself as he realises he isn't to the pitch
tossed up on off stump, Mathews looks for the single on the leg side and that makes him offer a little outside edge into the off side
gets back and whips a length ball, a flat one, to midwicket
eased down the ground to long-on
shuffles across on off stump, and flicks along the turf through square leg to bring up the fifty stand
that's in the air, but it lobs square leg! Flicks his wrists a little too early and the good length ball held in the deck just long enough to make a few home fans nervous
flighted just outside off, Mahela is forward to defend
caressed over the covers. Enough room for him to go up and over the infield. Afridi playing with his line and flight
flighted and angled in at Mathews, pushed towards midwicket
looped up just outside off, Mathews wanted to drive through the covers but ends up collecting a single to long-on
shorter and quicker on middle, Mahela is in line with it and picks a single to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
a little too short and Mahela scythes it behind point. Played that so late and opened the face to bisect third man and backward point
flighted just outside off, Mahela drives calmly to the left of long-off
held his length back a touch and Mathews, who was into his drive a little to early, does not pick the gap in the covers
pushed down the ground to long-on
rank long hop and Mahela has pummeled this to the midwicket boundary, pulled with consummate authority
full toss outside off, Mahela looks to launch through the covers but is cut off
flighted on off stump, pushed back at Afridi
chopped away to deep point as Mathews takes advantage of a shorter, flatter ball outside off
jumps down the track and settles into a defensive as Afridi pulls his length back. Struck on the pads which excites Akmal
whipped across the line and the straight ball is sent scurrying to deep square leg for a well-run couple
short ball, hammered off the stumps to long leg. Pakistan are losing their disciplines here
another shortish ball, which turns a little further than he expects. Still adjusts off the pitch and pulls to deep square leg
waits on a shortish ball and runs it down with an angled blade to third man
runs down the track and looks to hack a length ball on middle through the leg side and is beaten quite awkwardly. Zip off the deck for Wahab
shortish and angled onto his pads, Mathews flicks it to the man at deep fine leg
hammered away through the covers as this is a touch too full and has enough width for Mahela to throw his hands at it
back of a length and punched down to mid-on
banged in short and he pulls down to long leg again
flighted on middle, Mathews comes forward and defends
loads of flight again, just outside off, Mathews jams his bat down on it
pushed through quick and flat on off stump, flipper perhaps? Mathews whips to midwicket
stays back and punches the length ball to the right of long-on
enough turn for Afridi to beat the outside edge. Quicker ball, even quicker turn and Mahela smiles wryly in defeat
flighted and going on with the arm, Mahela blocks and gets an inside edge
Good length ball on and around off stump, pushed down the ground
skips down the track, Hafeez follows him with a flatter ball, Mathews opens the face to push back to the bowler
turn off the track, but it hinders the bowlers as Mathews leaves outside leg
down the track to push a fuller ball down the ground
turned away behind square leg as Mahela uses his wrists to keep the ball down
lunges down the track and whips a length ball over mid-on and midwicket. Ahmed Shehzad runs across to his right, but his dive is poor and Hafeez concedes his first boundary today
stays on the back foot to punch a length ball to midwicket
tossed up outside off, Mahela caresses it through the covers to a generous hooting of horns. Effortlessly composed half-century
how did he get his fifty so soon?! Hambantota is up on its feet as their captain launches a fuller ball over the covers. Magnificent strike
fuller ball on leg stump, picked away towards the midwicket region
opens the face and nips a single towards the point region
too short and Mahela has rocked back in his crease and pummels to the square leg boundary. Top-class pull and he didn't need to keep it down
tapped away with the spin towards backward point
short and wide as he bowls from around the wicket, Mathews has to reach out to cut to deep point
waits on a shortish ball and chops a length ball to deep third man
good length ball on off stump, defended confidently
striaghtens off a shortish length and had Mathews wafting. Beaten with the movement he generates, plus Mathews wasn't too keen to move his feet there
races down the pitch and gets a thick edge that flies over point and to the third man boundary. Thats the hundred stand and Sri Lanka are definitely on the charge
back of a good length, Mathews taps it through the covers for a single
good length ball, tapped down the ground to mid-on
huge appeal from the bowler, but for nothing. Length ball ducks in at him and Mahela was looking for a slog over midwicket. Misses it completely and it wasn't too far away from the off stump either
steered down to third man as this was short and outside off
jumps down the track, turns it into a full toss and Mathews has whipped it through midwicket. Pure power there
length ball invites Mathews on the charge again, mistimes it to mid-off but to no runs
shortish and angled in at the body, Mathews flicks but can't beat Irfan at short fine leg

Irfan lumbers after an on-the-up drive, he did not look like he was quick enough to stop it. Tumbles all over it and let it through. Almost looks like he trips over the ball and affords a boundary. Mahela's gone past Inzy in the run-getters list to be at No.5
eased off the open face to third man as Wahab bowls shortish and outside off
that was too quick for him! Short ball, strikes him on the side but he is still able enough to pick up a single. Wahab's pace has been quite impressive today
slices a fuller ball over the top but there is a sweeper in the deep. Width on offer and Mahela accepts it gladly
he'd run a little too far down looking for that cheeky single behind him, but Akmal leaps up to collect with his right hand and strikes his target. Very timely wicket for Pakistan.
shortish on middle, Thisara whips it away to deep square leg
angled in towards middle stump, pushed into the on-side, towards mid-on
good line, angling in towards off, and he defends back to the bowler
back of a length this time, no real room, and he pushes this to mid-off off the back foot

flat, fired in towards middle stump, and Mathews goes down on one knee and swats this away over the leg side, with the turn. Bounced just short of the rope, in the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket

goes for the slog-sweep again, but it's angled towards leg stump this time and he doesn't have as much room to free his arms. Doesn't quite get hold of it, and the ball goes rolling down to deep backward square leg
flat, on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
stays back as this is shortish and it's punched to extra cover
whoo! He's charged down to Afridi, which in itself is a feat, and has smoked a fuller ball down the ground. That was massive

loads of turn as he pulls his length back and got it to drift in as well. Mathews was left poking on the up, but the appeal for stumping is useless considering the batsman has planted his back leg behind the crease
short and wide, Mathews has clattered it to the point boundary. There was a man sweeping there, but he had enough time to pick the gap and does so perfectly
that's much better, flighted the straighter delivery on off stump and gets a bit of an inside edge. But Mathews works it to his advantage with a quick single

flogged miles past the midwicket boundary! Think that was seam up offspinner from Afridi but since it was on the pads, he cleared his front leg and unleashed a full swing of the bat. 17 runs off that over, Afridi completely off colour
seeks the yorker, but doesn't get it, Mathews has smeared it to the cover boundary. Along the ground, bludgeoned away to his highest ODI score. Hundred calling for Mathews
shortish on middle and leg, whips it away to short fine leg and sets off. It was Irfan there so might have been a calculated risk
got it just inside the line, but the ump doesn't agree! it was a wide yorker and he got it to tail in nicely. Unlucky for Junaid
short and wide, Thisara set up for the forehand down the ground but inside edged it. Mathews hurries across to the other end
length ball, heaved to midwicket and goes for a risky single, makes it with the Pakistan captain missing the target

short ball, just outside off meaning Thisara has to pull from outside off. Gets another inside edge onto the body. He can hit, yes, but Mathews is in such prime form, I wonder if it'd be better to return the strike to him
mid-off was up and this was length and outside off. Thisara smacks my analysis along with this ball to the boundary. Crisp and murderous
hustles the batsman at 146.5 kph, Mathews is quite uncomfortable as he looks to fend away towards short fine leg. Struck on the right glove and he wrings it
swings across the line as Wahab goes for the slower ball, dupes the batsman and clatters middle stump. Lovely change of pace
good length ball on off stump, opens the face towards point
back of a length and zips past the outside edge, too quick for the new batsman to handle
pulled to long leg as this is short and just a touch off target on leg stump
good length ball on off stump, Mathews could only block it back to the bowler
picked it up off a length and hammers it for a one-bounce four! That was unbelievable from Priyanjan. MIght even have made his captain envious at the other end. Stunning shot
walks across on off stump, and whips a full toss away to deep square leg for a single. Mathews says that's enough
crashed through the covers, perhaps with one hand as he looks to get leverage off an almost yorker length ball outside off.
tries to get cheeky as he moves outside off to lap it away over his left shoulder. Not there for that shot and gets a run into the off side off his pad
rushes outside off and scoops a length ball over short fine leg and Sri Lanka are motoring along. Picked the slower ball and pounced
short and angled into the body of Priyanjan, who goes for an upper cut and enjoys a fortunate boundary over the keeper. Hambantota is buzzing!
swipe across the line and his off stump is toppled! Backed away and looked for the slam through midwicket, to assist his team's need for quick runs, and perishes
length ball just outside off, Kula pushes it through the vacant point region
hammered down the ground as he backs away to a length ball and slams it down the ground
you little beauty! This was full and seeking middle stump, but Priyanjan has skipped across outside off and lapped it over short fine leg's head. Brilliant strike!
goes for the yorker on leg stump, doesn't get it and is whipped to midwcket
fuller and outside off, Kula eases it to the cover field who are on the circle so there is a single on offer
switches around the wicket and bowls full on off stump, Kula slaps it down the ground to mid-off who isn't quite as good as he should be. Afridi's failure to pick up results in a single
full toss on the stumps, Priyanjan backs away and flays it over the covers. This is some acceleration from Sri Lanka!

one-bounce again! He is wading into Pakistan's pacers! Short ball, picked away off his hips after he shuffled across to the off side. His pre-ball movements are putting Junaid off and it almost seems like he's anticipating the game plan of Pakistan
full toss outside off, Priyanjan flicks it into the midwicket region and races across the pitch for a couple
beats mid-off by a few metres. This was full and inviting the drive, gets it off the bottom of the bat and he's put enough power on it to lob the fielder running back

whipped away to the boundary past long leg! What a little cameo from Priyanjan! This was full and speared in on the pads, the batsman moved inside the line and unleashed his wrists. That makes it 105 runs off the last 60 balls to put Sri Lanka in command

inn2.comm: back of a length on off stump, defended carefully
keeps to a good length just outside off, Shehzad doesn't bother with it
shuffles across to protect his stumps and defends, a little gingerly
length ball on off stump, kept out
gets across on off stump and defends a length ball
stands up tall and punches the short ball outside off through to the point boundary. That time he settled into a much more confident position to meet the ball
fullish and tails in late from outside off, Hafeez lunges across to cover his stumps and leaves
a touch short and wide, Hafeez was right in going for a tap through point but doesn't connect
whips away with the movement in, Malinga has a race on his hands and he just about beats the ball with a well-timed boot
walks at him and Kula jags a good length ball into him and ventures the inside edge to long leg. The breeze is helping his movement in
fuller and brings the batsman forward to block into the covers
beaten outside off! He was hoping for it to duck back in as well, but Kula keeps it going straight on off a good length. Wily bowler, he is
fuller and nipping away outside off, Shehzad hoists his bat over his head
shortish and outside off, he gets in line with it
fuller and a shade outside off, Shehzad steps forward to block
gets a lovely shape away and Shehzad gets as far forward as he can to push to mid-off
short and wide and Shehzad pounces on it again, slices it in front of point with considerable authority

punched through the covers, high front elbow to get on top of the bounce and hammers it away far too powerfully for the fielder to have a chance. Malinga offering just a little more width than he should
jags a back of a length delivery back in at Hafeez, who plays it late enough and tucks it away through midwicket
violent movement in at the batsman, who was looking to cut considering the width there had been, and finds himself inside edging onto his front pad
full and a shade outside off, pushed back down the ground  as he jumps out of his crease to try and negate some of the movement

lunges forward to whip off his front knee, but the ball jags back a little too much for him to hit it off the middle. Mild appeal, but he was too far down the track. HawkEye says that was hitting leg though
good length ball that veers back in, Hafeez shoulders arms rather bravely
there's the one that holds its line to fool the batsman into an airy drive. Beaten outside the off stump
back of a length and outside off, defended
full and teasing outside off, Shehzad leaves confidently
good length ball just outside off, doesn't bother with it
good length ball just outside off, Shehzad is forward with a block
walks across to a shortish ball and punches down the ground. Herath was the man there and he took him on immediately. Pinches a single
way too much width and Hafeez has cracked it through to the point boundary, far to the left of the sweeper
gets back to a shortish ball and punches it to point with an open face
wafts at a good length ball too far outside off stump and is beaten as the ball cam in. Sam's jinxed him, not me
full and tailing in, flicked away behind square leg
waits for the movement in off a good length ball and blocks towards point
fuller ball on off stump, pushes back on the bowler
presents a straight bat to a full ball curling in on off stump
back of a length, punched to extra cover
moving away from a good length, left alone
still fuller, and slower too, pushed in front of mid off for one
walks outside off and punches to the sweeper for a single
stays around the crease to a length ball holding the line and pushes to sweeper cover
floated up widish outside off, left alone
coming in from just back of a length, pushed to mid on
steps across this time and walks out to a length delivery and picks it with the inswing high over midwicket, couple of bounces into the rope
played out to mid on with the swing into the right hander
walks outside off but is cramped as this comes in sharply from just back of a length
much fuller now, and he eases forward to drive it calmly between extra cover and mid off
beats short midwicket along the ground as he closes the face on an incoming ball for two more
stands in the crease and punches a length ball out to the sweeper

this one is angled in and Hafeez misses as he tries to whip it to leg from the crease, given right away, Pakistan review, that struck him pretty high, on the top of the flap, but ball tracker shows it is clipping the stumps, umpire's call stays and Hafeez has to go
away first ball, shuffles, drops the back of a length ball in front of cover and scurries for the single, there is a direct hit, but Shehzad is home quite safely
left alone outside off as this moves away a tad from a good length
punched from the crease but Dilshan at backward point dives and stops it
Perera misfields at third man but no damage done as they settle for a single off Shehzad's stylish steer
covers the inswing as he shuffles outside off and defends down the track
punches against the inward movement but finds point
that could have been tight, Shehzad pushed a fuller ball to mid off and went for the single, had to really push hard in the end, throw missed, but he would have just beaten a direct hit
allows it to come in from outside off, stays in the crease and guides it past slip to third man
coming in consistently from Kula, Shehzad lets it go past
gets behind the line of an inswinger with a shuffle across and defends to the bowler
takes the ball further as the batsman jumps across his off stump, hopes for a wide as he leaves it but doesn't get it
full and outside off, goes for the drive on the up but can't beat the off-side in-field
jumps across outside off and whips a fuller delivery down to long leg. A Priyanjan shot
looks to heave a length ball into the yawning spaces to deep midwicket. Herath has to race across from mid-on to rein that in
stays on the back foot and punches a shortish ball into the covers

innovates, innovates, innovates and finds the lone man at long leg! This was a length ball, that he drags all the way from outside off with a lap sweep that pings off the middle and homes in on Kula's hands
good length ball outside off, Akmal lunges forward to block
gets up on his toes to punch through the covers to get off the mark
shortish with a little nibble away, Shehzad has to adjust to it rather late as he blocks with an open face
feels a little pressure as he goes for a waft outside off, gets a thick edge that flies down to third man
fuller delivery outside off, driven through the covers
jumps down the track and taps the length ball past mid-on
uses hard hands to drill a shortish ball down the ground to mid-on
shuffles across to defend a shortish delivery outside off
skips down the track and goes for a flay down the ground. Gets it off the bottom edge, but still has just enough to trickle to the boundary. Offcutter presented at just the right length to whack
short and wide, slashed to the sweeper in the deep
races down the track again, but Thisara steers his good length ball a little further away outside off. Akmal leaves
whipped from outside off well wide of mid-on. Herath has to put on his skates again and Pakistan tuck into a three
shortish and with enough width for Shehzad to slice it to the left of point. Dilshan mans the region and doesn't let it pass him
waits on it a little more and pours a little more power into slashing the short ball well behind point. Lovely shot from Shehzad
shortish around the off stump, Shehzad pushes down to mid-on
opens the face on a back of a length ball with some width. Sri Lanka are feeding him on the back foot and he seems quite content there
punched through the covers as he stands up tall and uses a high front elbow to power his shot. Again shorter delivery from Thisara
lots of wristwork there as he whips a back of a length delivery from well outside off straight of midwicket and it shall be drinks
good length, with a little turn. Shehzad taps it down the ground
touch short and Akmal makes it worse with some quick footwork, gets deep in his crease and hammers it through to deep midwicket
stays back and pushes the flatter, straighter ball down to long-off
loopy delivery just outside off, Shehzad waits for it and opens the face to beat the lone slip and pick up three to third man
that was well bowled, quicker and angled in on middle and leg. Akmal blocks just in time
short and wide, Shehzad taps it away to third man and settles at the other end
he sticks to a back of a length and outside off, Akmal enjoys it as he slices behind point. Brilliant timing and placement

throws his head donw in disgust, then stares up at the heavens as he has to walk back. Lovely catch from Malinga at mid-on after Akmal tries to force the pace with an unwise loft. He did not have the room to free his arms, his shot looked quite awkward and there was no power on it. Malinga runs back and to his right, tumbles and secures a good catch
good length ball just outside off, steered away with an open face
good length ball on and around off stump, slices it towards point
ventures fuller and outside off, Shehzad offers it free passage to the keeper
tossed up on middle and Misbah lunges forward to block, gets a bit of an outside edge towards the covers
a far more solid push down the ground as his front leg reaches the pitch
round-arms a fuller ball in on middle and leg, defended
flighted on middle and leg, kept out
stays back to a fuller ball on off stump and chops it to short third man
shuffles across and taps a good length ball from outside off to midwicket, they set off for a quick single and make it
switches to a fuller length and Shehzad drives down the ground to mid-off
good length just outside off, Misbah steps forward and blocks
extra bounce just outside off, Misbah is caught in his crease and blocks. Pulls his bottom hand off the bat and is called into a quick single
leans into a solid drive on the up and finds a single to the sweeper. Thisara's decided to bowl a lot fuller over the past two overs
whips from the off stump to long leg as Misbah camps on his back foot to a shorter ball
races down the track as Thisara pulls his length back, doesn't matter as Shehzad opens the face of the bat and threads the gap between backaward and cover points. Top class shot!
tossed up on middle, defended solidly
gets down the track and taps the ball down the ground. Herath tries to field it himself but the non-striker does not budge and he runs headlong into his legs. Shehzad hugs in apology
jumps down the track and blocks
flighted on middle and off, pushed down the pitch

has he held it! He has! But he was overbalancing on the boundary, and throws the ball back into the field of play. This was on a fuller length and Misbah slammed it down the ground and that monstrous power he can sometimes wield almost takes the ball over the boundary. Great work by Chandimal there at long-on
good length ball, whipped away through midwicket

he looks dumbfounded as Sri Lanka celebrate! Thisara is pulling this game around to the home side's corner. Just a little nip back in, but Shehzad was shuffling across and playing around the line of the ball, which sneaks through the gap between bat and pad
good length ball just outside off, gets in line after using a Katich-type or rahter Chanderpaul-type stance, and blocks
good length ball on and around off stump, defended into the leg side
whipped away from outside off and seeks a couple. Note quite there with the long leg rushing in
back of a length just outside off, Misbah gets up tall and blocks
flighted just outside off, Fawad tucks it around the corner
brings him forward with a flighted ball just outside off
takes it on the full and sweeps it from middle to deep square leg
pushed through on middle, Fawad was looking for the sweep again. Adjusts and turns it behind square leg and sneaks a couple, dragged his captain along and is helped by a bad throw
flighted just outside off, Fawad defends a little gingerly
short and wide outside off, he manages to reach it but the cut doesn't beat a diving short third man. Randiv, the sub, does some good work on his left
goes for the flick through midwicket but ends up with an inside edge onto the pad. Back of a length  from Thisara
short and wide, Fawad sets up for the cut and slaps it away to the sweeper
on a length and it's flicked away off middle to deep midwicket
change of pace and Fawad had to adjust midway into his shot. Uses soft hands to defend as the ball lobs off his pads into the leg side
sees the angle across him and tries to manufacture a punch through the off side, he ends up too close to the shortish ball
that's the arm ball and Misbah played a little outside the line. Herath launches into a vociferous applea as he is struck on leg stump. Tight call of no from Umpire S Ravi
jumps down the track and brings this strong wrists into play to punish Herath to the midwicket boundary

Sanga! you little beauty! Saw Misbah going down to lap the ball away, but Herath pulled the length back just enough for him to mistime the sweep, getes a little glove and and great footwork from Sanga makes him pull off a good. reflex catch
flighted on middle and off, Maqsood leans forward and drive through the covers
opens the face and drives through point
pushed through on middle, Maqsood taps it back at the bowler
slower, fuller ball just outside off. Fawad eases forward into a fuller one and turns it away behind square
shortish and outside off, left alone and that's called one for the over
caressed along the ground to the sweeper on the off side after being invited on the front foot
banged in short and Fawad goes a little too hard on his pull and gets it off the bottom of the bat through midwicket
that is classy, not quite so from the bowler who strays on the pads. Maqsood is well-balanced and clips through midwicket and has enough on it to reach the boundary
good length ball just outside off, defends
flighted just outside off, Fawad leans forward and turns into htelg side
tossed up on off stump, kept out
plays close to the body as he opens the face and pinches a single behind point
flighted on middle, Maqsood pushes down to long-off and trots off for a single
seeks a single down the ground, but Herath hustles to his left and pulls in the push

that turned quite alarmingly! Fawad was setting up for a late cut having seen the ball a touch short, but the turn has him in a middle and he is struck on the glove while getting in position. Appeal for leg before, but that was turning too much
offcutter to start off and Maqsood has flicked it down ot long-on
looks for the yorker outside off but it ends up a full toss. Fawad gets an outside edge and the ball goes on the bounce to the keeper
this time the yorker's bang on and Fawad's jammed his bat down in time to protect his off stump
looks for another yorker, just around the off stump. Fawad tries a whip but doesn't time it well enough. Goes down the ground and Malinga pulls out a useful boot
another off cutter to finish off, but again it is a low full toss on middle and Maqsood drills it to mid-on
back of a length and just outside off, Maqsood offers an open face and steals a couple to third man. Misfield from the man in the deep
good length ball on off stump, Maqsood is brought forward to block into the covers
walks at the bowler and drives down the ground to mid-off. Hit uppishly but there was no one to threaten the trajectory of the ball
slogged away to the midwicket boundary, had to use every bit of his frame to get the power into this shot and still it only dribbled into the ropes. Poor length from Thisara, sat up for the swipe
strikes a fuller length but Fawad waits on the back foot and chooses to cut, not enough room for it
banged in short and Fawad chops it behind him and past the keeper
fires in around the yorker length outside off, Maqsood brings down an open face to find point
slower ball, almost deceived Fawad. He was moving away outside leg, worried about the yorker and pushes it into the covers
that's at full pace and gets a little inward movement as well, Fawad has to hurry into a flick down the ground to protect his stumps
full and outside off, Fawad stays outside leg and slices it to deep point
good length ball, slower in pace, sliced away towards point
another slower ball seeking the base of he stumps, Maqsood is fooled as well but manages to get his wits in time to flick to midwicket
tossed up and that lures Maqsood to driving over the top. Hammered down the ground, but it doesn't reach the man in the deep
opens up and hits against the turn, but he has reached the pitch and lifts it cleanly. Strong stroke
turned away from middle into the midwicket region
cut from off stump! This was tossed up and angled into the left-hander, but Fawad had it under control as he chopped to third man
clipped off middle to short midwicket
fuller and flatter, Maqsood drives to long-off to make it nine for the over
shortish and just outside off, punched through to mid-off
heaves with all his might, but he was hitting against the breeze and the length ball only travels as far as deep square leg. Dribbles to the fielder, really
slower ball on the stumps, Fawad drops and runs and might have been in trouble, had the fielder at cover picked the ball cleanly. Seemed to be Kula and Fawad takes a little time to sigh
clipped away through the vacant midiwcket region
length ball outside off, Fawad slashes from the crease and looks to have earned himself a boundary until Dilshan dived and pulls off a spectacular save
slapped away to the sweeper
flighted on middle and off, turned away into the midwicket region for a single
fired in short and down the leg side, Maqsood slams it over short fine leg to lift the total to 150
this time the quicker ball finds the block hole on off stump, Maqsood punches down the ground
flighted and it is a touch slower as well, driven back at the bowler
tossed up on middle, Fawad gets down and sweeps to the right of short fine leg. Dilshan for some reason thinks that hit the pad and appeals
pushed through fuller and straighter on middle, looks for a flick and gets a leading edge
good length ball just a shade outside off, Maqsood chops it past the keeper
full and sliding down leg and Pakistan enjoy five wides as Sanga can't get behind it either
good length ball punched back to mid-off
on a good length and thumped through the off side
banged in short as the batsman raced down the track. Swings across the line and is beaten soundly
good length ball just outside off, defended
whipped away off middle and picks a single. Pakistan are getting a move on here, with 114 needed off 78
jumps down the track and is beaten all ends up! The turn is too much for the batsman, and the keeper as well. Missed stumping and it ends up as four byes
flighted just outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
pushed through on middle, Maqsood keeps it out
finds a yorker on middle, digs it out
flatter delivery that skids on towards off stump, Maqsood chops it away with an open face.
hits the blockhole and Maqsood's aggressive intent is foiled
full toss outside off, Fawad slices it to the sweeper
full, but not quite the yorker so Maqsood has drilled it through the covers
full and wide outside off, Fawad steers it to deep third man and keep the score ticking over
doles out a full toss which is smashed down the ground with utter disdain. Pakistan are making a fist of this
another full toss as he searches for the yorker. Hasty single taken as Malinga misfields
keeps his front leg away and slashes a fuller ball straight to cover

dances down and lifts a length ball handsomely over the infield. Has a great amount of air time but Hambtantota is a huuuge ground and Changimal has enough time to run around and slap it back into the field of play at long-on
drilled down the ground to long-off. Fuller delivery, but it was flat and almost yorker length
tossed up outside off and he lunges forward to get into a sweep. Strong shot to deep square leg
tossed up a little slower on off stump, Maqsood realises the danger and taps it towards point
full toss outside off, swept around the corner to short fine leg
no slip and Maqsood takes advantage of it and slice the quicker, good length ball to the third man boundary. Lovely, calculating innings in an unfamilar situation
finds the yorker just outside off, ferreted out into the covers

fires a low full toss on middle and he has whipped it with stunning power all along the ground. There were two men running after it, but even the man on the boundary can't pull it back. Vital fifty for Maqsood!
another whip off the legs as he imbues a lot of power into an almost yorker from Malinga
full toss, sliced away to deep point
full on off stump, drilled to extra cover
fullish on middle and leg, Maqsood whips down the ground to long-on
starts off with a leg cutter and its punched into the extra cover region for a quick single
slapped down the ground! Offers up a length ball that had enough width to free the arms. Fawad takes full toll
walks across to off stump and Kula follows him, drives through the covers for a single
anticipates the yorker, keeps his legs away and drills it down to long-off. He's been doing that all through
full and wide, Fawad runs down the track looks to power it through the off side. His own footwork goes against him and he misses the ball
good old inside edge to the boundary! Ramiz says, "French cut though he has a full beard," as the ball scurries away past the outstretched hand of Sanga
shuffles across on off stump but the leg stump yorker ends up a little too far down
fired in full and outside off, Maqsood slams it to the man on the edge of the circle at cover
fires a yorker on leg stump and flicks it through midwicket for a couple to bring up the hundred partnership

again, whips a leg-stump yorker along the ground and seems to have pierced the gap between deep squrae leg and deep midwicket. Chandimal called for it, but Tharanga hadn't head it and collides with the Chandimal's slide and topples over the boundary and goes off the field for some treatment. It was his left calf
that's a yorker on leg stump, Maqsood looks for a tickle past the keeper but didn't get enough on it
low full toss on middle, loads up that bottom hand and hammers through square leg for a couple. Had to hurry to complete it
full on middle, Maqsood pushes down the ground to long-on
spots the slower ball early, moves inside the line and lifts it over the covers for a magnificent boundary. Pakistan are nosing ahead here
doesn't afford him any room this time but Maqsood has flicked it wide of long-on and Fawad drags him back for a second
length on off stump, Maqsood bludgeons it straight to extra cover
walks across and whips a full ball from off stump to long-on. Lots of pressure applied on the deep fielders, but this time Maqsood slips
fuller and outside off, Fawad taps it to mid-off and runs
follows the batsman who was making some room, but it is a low full toss and a flick of the wrists sends it scurrying to deep square leg
slower ball that dips a touch on Maqsood, he goes at it with just his hands and the ball lobs over a vacant square leg
heaves for the boundary through the covers, but the desired result appears in the form of a thick edge to third man
full toss on middle, Fawad backs away and smokes it through the covers. The sweeper has to run around and keep it to two

jumps down the track and drills the fuller ball down the ground. Mid-off aims a throw, Fawad dives headlong to safety and takes a few moments to compose himself. He almost looks drained. Time for a little re-hydration
slower in pace and it ends up a full toss on middle, ticked away to midwicket
sliced away to deep third man as he brings it down on a yorker-length ball outside off
width on offer and Fawad slaps it through point for a fifty! Finds the gap on the off side with all the deep fielders on the leg side. Smart batting
flightede on off stump, Fawad drops a dead bat on it and sneaks a single behind point
fires in a length ball down the leg side and Maqsood has hammered a sweep over the head of short fine leg. His range on the leg side has been impressive but have Sri Lanka played into his hands
pushed through on off stump, slapped to mid-off
Herath tumbles to his right to try and keep the push down the ground to nothing but again he can't get past the non-striker
tossed up well outside off, Fawad lunges forward, takes it on the full and laps it fine of the short fine leg. First Malinga, now Herath. Sri Lanka becoming unhinged
sends down a yorker that is a shade down leg side. Sanga looks like wants to go to war against that decision
slower ball on middle, tucked away straight of midwicket
drilled over extra cover! Malinga's yorkers have not gone to play today and both batsmen are tucking into him. Keeps to the leg side of the ball and his bottom hand gives him enough leverage
backs away and taps a slower, full toss to cover
finds the yorker on middle, Fawad goes for a flick and knows he has hit it soft enough to sneak a two with both midiwcket and square leg on the boundary

slower ball on a length on off stump, Fawad clears his front leg and taps it into the point region. Fawad wanted the single, Maqsood answered. Then Fawad had second thoughts, Dilshan waited, decided on which end and threw but Malinga wasn't backing up at his end
length ball outside off, Fawad swings off his hips and gets a thick leading edge that sails down the throat of deep third man. Priyanjan holds on to a pressure catch
fuller ball just outside off, Afridi presents the full face of the bat. Textbook off drive for a couple
one was enough, he says and swings off his feet at a length ball. Misses
short and angled down leg side, Afridi swivels on his back foot and helps it on its way. Pulled fine enough to beat the man in the deep
walks at him as Kula shortens his length. Afridi taps into the off side and races across

how much power does he put into this drills! This was almost yorker length, but the strength of his bottom hand means the ball skids down the grund until Thisara pulls out a boot. Had enough time to bend down or dive, but he prefers the easy and risky way
whips a fullish delivery from middle and leg towards midwicket
slower ball, on a good length just outside off. Maqsood steers it to third man
slower ball on a fuller length, Afridi pushes a single behind point
slower ball and he finally beats him, Maqsood offers a wry smile as he flashes and misses and props himself up on his bat handle
that has been smashed! Malinga misses his length and it sits up for the batsman to pummel down the ground. That was an umpire killer
slower ball which ends up a full toss on middle, short-arm pulled to deep fine leg
full toss, dragged from outside off to deep midwicket
dug in short and Afridi pulls confidently to deep square leg
bouncer again, Maqsood is hurried as he goes for a hook. Gets a top edge but it doesn't carry as far as deep fine leg
that's the yorker, or rather Afridi manufactures a yorker as he walks at Kula. Dug out

banged in short and Afridi goes for a hook, it had too much height and too much pace on it and he was on the front good as well. Maqsood was racing down for a bye, but Afridi says no. Sanga underarmed it to the bowler, but Nuwan misses his flick  onto he stumps. Awful cricket as the equation becomes two off two

sliced past poing and Afridi has the winning runs! But most of the running was from the man at hte nonstrikers who runs in to hug Afridi. Backed away and thwacked the short ball away from middle and leg to set the dressing room into delight
